channel.title: How to make a mod have certain rights?
channel.description:
Ok ive seen this in other servers.
There could be a mod with only kick and mute rights
then there would be another mod with kick mute jail ban and unmute
Anyone have an idea how to do this I might want to add it to the source Like a trial mod =O

item.title: How to make a mod have certain rights?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Use their username in the if-statement.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("") && playerRights >= 1 && playerName.equals("")) { //command stuff here }

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a mod have certain rights?

item.title: How to make a mod have certain rights?
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

another playerRights, make it playerRights = 0.5
so its a half mod

if (command.startsWith("kick") && playerRights >= 0.5) { do stuff; }

oh and you have to give them a crown to, so just copy the playerRights 1 model.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a mod have certain rights?
